title: Darkstream: Jordan Peterson’s IQ revealed
author: VD
content_html: If you want the answer, watch the Darkstream! Bonus points if you can catch the one step that Peterson’s defenders can legitimately attack. Although it will ultimately do them no good whatsoever, they might be able to make enough rhetorical hay out of it to convince some who desperately don’t want to believe.
